Sebastián RIFFO

Former postdoctoral fellow
at Géoazur CNRS

Publications

  • P.-H. Cocquet, S. Riffo, J. Salomon. Optimization of bathymetry for long waves with small amplitude (Available in HAL), to appear in SIAM Journal on Control and Optimization (SICON).

  • J. Ledoux, S. Riffo, J. Salomon. Analysis of the Blade Element Momentum Theory (Available in HAL), to appear in SIAM Journal on Applied Mathematics (SIAP).

  • S. Riffo. Mathematical methods for marine energy extraction (Manuscript) (Thesis defense). PhD Dissertation, Université Paris Dauphine-PSL, 2019.

In progress

  • F. Kwok, S. Riffo, J. Salomon. Time-parallelization of sequential data assimilation problems (DD26 talk).
  • P.-H. Tournier, P. Jolivet, V. Dolean, H. Aghamiry, S. Operto and S. Riffo. Large-scale 3D frequency-domain wave simulation with finite-elements, finite-differences and an ORAS preconditioner (arXiv preprint).
